name: Oakland YouthBuild
description: Earn GED while learning construction skills with paid stipend and job placement
fullDescription: Oakland YouthBuild helps young adults ages 16-24 earn their GED while learning construction skills by building affordable housing in their community.
whatTheyOffer:
- GED preparation and high school diploma
- Construction skills training
- Industry certifications (OSHA, forklift, etc.)
- Leadership development
- Paid stipend during program
- Job placement assistance
- Supportive services
howToGetIt:
1. Must be 16-24 years old
2. Must be low-income
3. Must not have high school diploma (or working on GED)
4. Contact Oakland YouthBuild for application
5. Complete intake and interview
6. Begin program cycle (typically starts twice per year)
keywords: YouthBuild, Oakland, youth, construction, job training, GED, high school, affordable housing, community service, 16-24
